page.title: 08A BYPASS FOR DUMFRIES (cont)
page.content:
LINE F. Cost = Â£9.136 million This is an inner town route that mixes bypass and town centre traffic together. It would need: seven houses demolished.Thirty-three acres of potential housing land sterilised. Requires substantial landscaping. Local residents find this route unacceptable. We asked residents of houses affected by the bypass if they would fill in a questionnaire about the bypass, here are our results: 72% agreed with the idea of the bypass, and 28% disagreed with it.
We asked the residents if they would be allocated with new accommodation.
